Table type
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, One row per patient | 2, Multiple rows per patient | 0, N/A (i.e., not linked to patient)

Field Label:
Table definition
Brief, human-readable text string, e.g., Medications

Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 0, DRAFT (table under consideration) | 1, Active | 2, DEPRECATED (table retired from use)

Field Label: Date table added (as draft or active)
Date of table deprecation
REQUIRED This table is required for database integrity and should always be included with data submissions.
Display this table in human-readable documents and forms?

Table display name

Section Header: Variable Definition
Field Label: Variable name

Variable format
Modify the data dictionary to revise these data types to fit your data model.
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, Character | 2, Numeric | 3, Character or Numeric | 4, YYYY-MM-DD | 5, YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm

Field Label: Variable description

Extra text for variable description (subheader)
Will be displayed in italics underneath the variable description.

TABLE PRIMARY KEY / COMPOSITE KEY (Is this variable the primary key for this table, or part of a composite key? A key variable is one that can uniquely identify each row in the table. A composite key combines two or more columns in the table to uniquely identify each row.)
REQUIRED (This variable is required for database integrity and should always be included when data from this table is requested.)

ID TO INDEX This variable is an ID variable that should match with the main index ID variable (e.g., PATIENT) in the main patient index table (e.g., tblBAS). The index table and main ID variables are specified in Harmonist 0C.
Variable Status
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 0, DRAFT (variable under consideration) | 1, Active | 2, DEPRECATED (variable retired from use)

Field Label: Date variable added (as draft or active)
Date of variable deprecation

Deprecated variable replaced by other variable
Only use if one-to-one replacement
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: SELECT CONCAT(a.record, ':', b.instance), CONCAT(a.value, ' : ', b.value) FROM (SELECT record,value FROM redcap_data WHERE project_id=1537 AND field_name = 'table_name') a JOIN (SELECT record, value, IFNULL(instance,1) as instance FROM redcap_data WHERE project_id=1537 AND field_name = 'variable_name') b  ON b.record=a.record ORDER BY a.value, b.instance

Field Label: Instructions for deprecated variable

Display order for this variable
Numbering only applies within a table. Decimals are allowable, e.g., use 1.5 to place a variable between variables 1 and 2)
Field Note: (e.g., use 1.5 to place a variable between variables 1 and 2)

Section Header: Variable Codes
Field Label: Is this a coded variable?
Select code list:

Section Header: Data Quality Guidance
Field Label: Report missing entries as data quality errors

Include this variable in the Completeness heatmap in the regular Harmonist Data Toolkit Report
This is for the regular data summary report, not the Quality Metrics Report, which reports all variables.
